# aw-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                       | Type                                                           | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `blocked`  | `blocked`  | Define if button takes all width of container or if container is a flex, the button assume flex=1 | `boolean`                                                      | `false`     |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Define if buttons is disabled                                                                     | `boolean`                                                      | `false`     |
| `size`     | `size`     | Define button size                                                                                | `"huge" \| "large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                     | `'medium'`  |
| `type`     | `type`     | Button type                                                                                       | `"button" \| "submit"`                                         | `'button'`  |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | Button variant                                                                                    | `"danger" \| "outline" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'primary'` |


## Events

| Event       | Description | Type                |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------- |
| `awClicked` |             | `CustomEvent<void>` |
